remarks: For any cover refinement, there exists a function associating with each set in the refinement a set in the original cover containing it.  This is sometimes used as a defintion of refinement.  Note that this definition uses the axiom of choice through ~ ac6sg .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jan-2020.)
